delete_rest_service_fecru_admin_projects.title:
Deletes a project by key (including all reviews in this project).
 Use 
 to move reviews to another project.
delete_rest_service_fecru_admin_projects.description:
Deletes a project by key (including all reviews in this project).
 Use 
 to move reviews to another project.

deleteAllowedReviewerGroup.title: Delete group from project's allowed reviewer group list
deleteAllowedReviewerGroup.description: Delete group from project's allowed reviewer group list

addAllowedReviewerGroup.title: Add group to project's allowed reviewer group list
addAllowedReviewerGroup.description: Add group to project's allowed reviewer group list

deleteAllowedReviewerUser.title: Remove user from project's allowed reviewer users list
deleteAllowedReviewerUser.description: Remove user from project's allowed reviewer users list

addAllowedReviewerUser.title: Add user to project's allowed reviewer users list
addAllowedReviewerUser.description: Add user to project's allowed reviewer users list

deleteDefaultReviewerGroup.description: Delete group from project's default reviewer group list

deleteDefaultReviewerUser.description: Remove user from project's default reviewer users list

addDefaultReviewerUser.title: Add user to project's default reviewer users list

moveAllReviews.title: Move reviews and snippets from source project to destination project
moveAllReviews.description: Move reviews and snippets from source project to destination project

get_rest_service_fecru_admin_repositorie.title: Retrieve a page of repositories. Repository properties with default values may not be returned.
get_rest_service_fecru_admin_repositorie.description: Retrieve a page of repositories. Repository properties with default values may not be returned.

get_rest_service_fecru_admin_repositorie.title: Returns information about the status of the repository and the current indexing status
get_rest_service_fecru_admin_repositorie.description: Returns information about the status of the repository and the current indexing status

deleteRepository.title:
Deletes repository.
 Warning: you can not undo this operation
deleteRepository.description:
Deletes repository.
 Warning: you can not undo this operation

reindexChangesetComments.title:
Rebuilds the changeset discussion index for the specified repository. The index is used to display changeset
 discussions in activity streams.
reindexChangesetComments.description:
Rebuilds the changeset discussion index for the specified repository. The index is used to display changeset
 discussions in activity streams.

post_rest_service_fecru_admin_repositori.title:
Re-indexes the linecount data used to generate the LOC graphs. The linecount data will be recalculated in daily
 buckets based on the server timezone.
post_rest_service_fecru_admin_repositori.description:
Re-indexes the linecount data used to generate the LOC graphs. The linecount data will be recalculated in daily
 buckets based on the server timezone.

doReviewRevisionReindex.title: Re-indexes all the Crucible revision data (which revisions have been reviewed)
doReviewRevisionReindex.description: Re-indexes all the Crucible revision data (which revisions have been reviewed)

rebuildSearchIndex.title:
Rebuilds the search index data for the given repository. This will rebuild the data used to search by path,
 commit message and comitter, also used for activity streams and JIRA integration.
rebuildSearchIndex.description:
Rebuilds the search index data for the given repository. This will rebuild the data used to search by path,
 commit message and comitter, also used for activity streams and JIRA integration.

post_rest_service_fecru_admin_repositori.title:
Deletes the existing cache and re-indexes the repository from scratch.
 For large or slow repositories this may take some time, during which some functionality will be unavailable.
 This action will also restart the repository.
post_rest_service_fecru_admin_repositori.description:
Deletes the existing cache and re-indexes the repository from scratch.
 For large or slow repositories this may take some time, during which some functionality will be unavailable.
 This action will also restart the repository.

post_rest_service_fecru_admin_repositori.title: Re-scans the repository metadata for SVN and Perforce repositories. Only valid for Perforce and SVN repositories.
post_rest_service_fecru_admin_repositori.description: Re-scans the repository metadata for SVN and Perforce repositories. Only valid for Perforce and SVN repositories.

scan.title:
Runs an incremental repository index now.  This is the same operation as triggered by scheduled indexing.
 Can be called using the REST Api Token to authorize.
scan.description:
Runs an incremental repository index now.  This is the same operation as triggered by scheduled indexing.
 Can be called using the REST Api Token to authorize.

scanCvs.title: Scans the whole CVS repository for any changes since the last scan. Only valid for CVS repositories.
scanCvs.description: Scans the whole CVS repository for any changes since the last scan. Only valid for CVS repositories.

stopRepository.title: Stops the repository. Does not wait for the repository to stop before returning.
stopRepository.description: Stops the repository. Does not wait for the repository to stop before returning.

get_rest_service_fecru_admin_repositorie.title: Retrieve a repository by key. Repository properties with default values may not be returned.
get_rest_service_fecru_admin_repositorie.description: Retrieve a repository by key. Repository properties with default values may not be returned.

fullIncrementalIndex.title:
Runs an full incremental repository index.
 For CVS: scans the whole CVS repository for any changes since the last scan.
 For other repository types will trigger an incremental index.
fullIncrementalIndex.description:
Runs an full incremental repository index.
 For CVS: scans the whole CVS repository for any changes since the last scan.
 For other repository types will trigger an incremental index.

incrementalIndex.title:
Runs an incremental repository index.  This is the same operation as triggered by scheduled indexing.
 Can be called using the REST API Token to authorize.
incrementalIndex.description:
Runs an incremental repository index.  This is the same operation as triggered by scheduled indexing.
 Can be called using the REST API Token to authorize.

updatePermissions.title:
Updates repository permissions properties.

 Valid permission settings: any combination of useDefaults, allowAnonymous, allowLoggedIn.
updatePermissions.description:
Updates repository permissions properties.

 Valid permission settings: any combination of useDefaults, allowAnonymous, allowLoggedIn.

removeGroupToPermissions.title: Delete group from repository allowed groups
removeGroupToPermissions.description: Delete group from repository allowed groups

permissionsGroups.title:
Note: use /rest-service-fecru/admin/repository-permissions/ endpoint for full repository permission administration functionality
 Lists groups allowed to access repository.
permissionsGroups.description:
Note: use /rest-service-fecru/admin/repository-permissions/ endpoint for full repository permission administration functionality
 Lists groups allowed to access repository.

addGroupToPermissions.title:
Note: use /rest-service-fecru/admin/repository-permissions/ endpoint for full repository permission administration functionality
 Adds group to repository allowed groups
addGroupToPermissions.description:
Note: use /rest-service-fecru/admin/repository-permissions/ endpoint for full repository permission administration functionality
 Adds group to repository allowed groups

reindexChangesetDiscussion.title:
Rebuilds the changeset discussion index for the specified repository. The index is used to display changeset
 discussions in activity streams.
reindexChangesetDiscussion.description:
Rebuilds the changeset discussion index for the specified repository. The index is used to display changeset
 discussions in activity streams.

put_rest_service_fecru_admin_repositorie.title:
Re-indexes the linecount data used to generate the LOC graphs. The linecount data will be recalculated in daily
 buckets based on the server timezone.
put_rest_service_fecru_admin_repositorie.description:
Re-indexes the linecount data used to generate the LOC graphs. The linecount data will be recalculated in daily
 buckets based on the server timezone.

reindexReviews.title: Re-indexes all the Crucible revision data (which revisions have been reviewed)
reindexReviews.description: Re-indexes all the Crucible revision data (which revisions have been reviewed)

reindexSearch.title:
Rebuilds the search index data for the given repository. This will rebuild the data used to search by path,
 commit message and committer, also used for activity streams and JIRA integration.
reindexSearch.description:
Rebuilds the search index data for the given repository. This will rebuild the data used to search by path,
 commit message and committer, also used for activity streams and JIRA integration.

put_rest_service_fecru_admin_repositorie.title:
Deletes the existing cache and re-indexes the repository from scratch.
 For large or slow repositories this may take some time, during which some functionality will be unavailable.
 This action will also restart the repository.
put_rest_service_fecru_admin_repositorie.description:
Deletes the existing cache and re-indexes the repository from scratch.
 For large or slow repositories this may take some time, during which some functionality will be unavailable.
 This action will also restart the repository.

put_rest_service_fecru_admin_repositorie.title: Re-scans the repository metadata. Only valid for Perforce and SVN repositories.
put_rest_service_fecru_admin_repositorie.description: Re-scans the repository metadata. Only valid for Perforce and SVN repositories.

start.title: Starts repository. Does not wait for the repository to start before returning.
start.description: Starts repository. Does not wait for the repository to start before returning.

stop.title: Stops repository. Does not wait for the repository to stop before returning.
stop.description: Stops repository. Does not wait for the repository to stop before returning.

updateDefaultPermissions.title:
Updates default repository permissions properties.

 Valid permission settings: any combination of allowAnonymous, allowLoggedIn
updateDefaultPermissions.description:
Updates default repository permissions properties.

 Valid permission settings: any combination of allowAnonymous, allowLoggedIn

post_rest_service_fecru_admin_users_.title: Creates a new user. Tries to add the user to fisheye-users and crucible-users groups if those exist.
post_rest_service_fecru_admin_users_.description: Creates a new user. Tries to add the user to fisheye-users and crucible-users groups if those exist.

get_rest_service_fecru_indexing_status_v.title: Returns indexing status of given repository.
get_rest_service_fecru_indexing_status_v.description: Returns indexing status of given repository.

getRecent.title: Get a list of recently visited items for the currently logged in user.
getRecent.description: Get a list of recently visited items for the currently logged in user.

getRecentDetailed.title: Get a list of recently visisted items for the currently logged in user, including the detailed entities.
getRecentDetailed.description: Get a list of recently visisted items for the currently logged in user, including the detailed entities.

getRecentProjects.title: Get a list of recently visited projects for the currently logged in user.
getRecentProjects.description: Get a list of recently visited projects for the currently logged in user.

getRecentProjectsDetailed.title: Get a list of recently visited projects for the currently logged in Project, including the detailed entities.
getRecentProjectsDetailed.description: Get a list of recently visited projects for the currently logged in Project, including the detailed entities.

getRecentRepositories.title: Get a list of recently visited repositories for the currently logged in user.
getRecentRepositories.description: Get a list of recently visited repositories for the currently logged in user.

getRecentRepositoriesDetailed.title: Get a list of recently visisted repositories for the currently logged in user, including the detailed entities.
getRecentRepositoriesDetailed.description: Get a list of recently visisted repositories for the currently logged in user, including the detailed entities.

getRecentReviews.title: Get a list of recently visited reviews for the currently logged in user.
getRecentReviews.description: Get a list of recently visited reviews for the currently logged in user.

getRecentReviewsDetailed.title: Get a list of recently visited reviews for the currently logged in user, including the detailed entities.
getRecentReviewsDetailed.description: Get a list of recently visited reviews for the currently logged in user, including the detailed entities.

getRecentSnippets.title: Get a list of recently visited snippets for the currently logged in user.
getRecentSnippets.description: Get a list of recently visited snippets for the currently logged in user.

getRecentSnippetsDetailed.description: Get a list of recently visited snippets for the currently logged in user, including the detailed entities.

getRecentUsers.title: Get a list of recently visited users for the currently logged in user.
getRecentUsers.description: Get a list of recently visited users for the currently logged in user.

getRecentUsersDetailed.description: Get a list of recently visited users for the currently logged in user, including the detailed entities.

getInfo.title: Provides general information about the server's configuration.
getInfo.description: Provides general information about the server's configuration.

setPref.title:
Using POST method to set a user preference.
 If repo is not set, the preference will be recognised as a global preference.
setPref.description:
Using POST method to set a user preference.
 If repo is not set, the preference will be recognised as a global preference.

getRepoPref.title: Getting user's preference related to a certain repository
getRepoPref.description: Getting user's preference related to a certain repository
